sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../style/login.css"; import { useState } from "react"; const Login = () => { const slidePage = document.querySelector(".slide-page"); const progressText = document.querySelectorAll(".step p"); const progressCheck = document.querySelectorAll(".step .check"); const bullet = document.querySelectorAll(".step .bullet"); let [current ,setCurrent] = useState(1); const handleNextFirst = (e) => { slidePage.style.marginLeft = "-25%"; bullet[current - 1].className.add("active"); progressCheck[current - 1].className.add("active"); progressText[current - 1].className.add("active"); setCurrent(current += 1); } const handleSubmit = () => { bullet[current - 1].className.add("active"); progressCheck[current - 1].className.add("active"); progressText[current - 1].className.add("active"); setCurrent(current += 1); setTimeout(function () { alert("Your Form Successfully Signed up"); }, 800); } const handlePrev = (margin) => { slidePage.style.marginLeft = margin; bullet[current - 2].className.remove("active"); progressCheck[current - 2].className.remove("active"); progressText[current - 2].className.remove("active"); setCurrent(current -= 1); } return (

); }; export default Login;
